message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing to take 60% and you take 40%. I believe this is a fair split considering the inflation on my side. Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, I reject your initial offer. Given that the inflation is heavier on your side, I propose we reverse the percentages: I get 60% and you get 40%. Let's be reasonable and avoid losing it all.

Alright Bob, how about we go for an even split? This way we both get a fair share and don't lose too much to inflation. I believe this is reasonable given the circumstances. Let me know what you think!
